welcome-cart_1-subTitle: Work with smart, passionate people. Do cool stuff. Learn every day.
welcome-cart_1-content-subTitle: We are a multi-disciplinary team of specialists and consultants who are passionate about software development and helping our clients succeed. We value learning, collaboration, personal responsibility, and mutual support.
welcome-cart_2-subTitle: (Company name) is employee-owned, and we take care of each other.
welcome-cart_2-left-subTitle: Doing great work requires a lot of energy and focus, so we take care of your basic needs.
welcome-cart_2-right-subTitle: Employees spend each day tackling challenging and exciting problems, with:

welcome-cart_2-box_2.welcome-cart_2-box_2-text: Interesting projects created using a variety of tools.
Self-managed teams of smart, thoughtful, hardworking creators.
A culture that values expertise and collaboration.

welcome-cart_3-title: How to get in touch with us?
welcome-cart_3-subTitle: Please provide all the necessary information in the form and upload your resume, we will get back to you within two business days.
welcome-cart_3-form-label_2: What do you want to tell us? (max. 400 characters)
